/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Lampposts stand sentinel along the sides of the road, their presence adding a sense of order to the scene. Buildings rise in the background, their facades a testament to the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. Cars can be seen in the distance, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The image is a snapshot of urban life, a moment frozen in time on a busy street in Beijing.
